[OBJECTS]
# type	x	y	ani_set_id	extra_settings per object type	type
# type: 0 = Mario , 1 = Brick, 2 = Goomba,3=KoopaTroopa,4= Ground,
#6 = Pipe,5 = block,7 = Invisible Brick
#8 = PiranhaPlant,9 = Coin,10 = FirePiranhaPlant,11 ParaGoomba
